text:
三、专人专版具体指什么？
答:34个部位精准测量
专人设计，单人单版
四、柏瑞雅专业功能辅料有哪些？
答：
石墨烯面料
远红外针织面料（原纱）
咖啡因面料
甲壳素抗菌面料
磁疗布
矿物质活磁能量石
五、柏瑞雅有哪四大系列？
答：
产品系列
邂逅瑞雅（畅享款）
共舞瑞雅（定制款）
拥抱瑞雅（定制款）
情系瑞雅（定制款）
六、邂逅瑞雅系列文胸9大特点？
trans:
(3) What exactly does a dedicated version mean?
A: Accurate measurement of 34 parts
Designed by a dedicated in-house team, single-user version
(4) What are the speciality functional accessories of Bryaa?
A:
Graphene fabrics
far infrared knitted fabric (raw yarn)
Caffeine fabrics
Chitosan antibacterial fiber
magnetic therapy cloth
mineral magnetic energy stones
(5) What are the four major series of Bryaa?
A:
Product range
Encounter Bryaa (Generally avaiable)
Dancing Bryaa (Customized)
Embrace Bryaa (Customized)
Together with Bryaa (Customized)
(6) What are the 9 features of the bras in the Encounter Bryaa collection?
